::CyberShark::

    He followed Zardus.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  F=
rom: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October =
05, 2000 5:21 PM
  Subject: Re: A new transformer...


  I did reply to Val=
tron, Kinger. I think it was post 17003.

  ::Zardus/DevilDuer::

  Zardus =
looks at Hot Rod and Cybershark, asserting what they could be good 
  for. =
He finally nods. "Both of you will need quarters," he says, remembering 
  =
that Battera didn't have any as her comm message arrives.

  "I'll be right=
 there," he says into his comm, "Set the CR chamber to put him 
  in stasis=
."

  He looks at HotRod, Cybershark, and Feline, walking off to the reside=
ntial 
  area and motioning for them to follow.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~
  DevilDuer smiles, watching the pod open. He looks over the femm as she=
 
  emerges, glancing around when she asks her question.

  "You're on past=
 earth," he says, realizing that she probably didn't detect 
  him. His han=
d stays near his gun, DevilDuer ready for battle just in case, 
  "What fac=
tion are you?"
